scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/junctions.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/junctions.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g jamesknelson/junctions
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cp CNAME _book && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:jamesknelson/junctions gh-pages --force
